title: File Final Return for a Closed Business
description: A sole proprietor closed their business mid-year and needs to file a final Schedule C.

tasks.description: Gather all income and expense information from the beginning of the year until the date the business closed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all final financial data.

tasks.description: Prepare the final Schedule C, calculating the net profit or loss for the partial year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately prepares the final business schedule.

tasks.description: Check the 'final return' box on the form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly indicates that this is the last return for the business.
